intro: Kohleria anonyma, commonly known as the silver leaf kohleria, is a flowering plant native to Brazil. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its striking silver-green leaves and clusters of small, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 3 meters. Its flowers, which are usually pink or white, bloom in the spring and summer months. Kohleria anonyma is valued in horticulture for its ornamental foliage and unique floral display.
